lead_paragraph: Sarah Ferguson is accused of using a power cord to repeatedly strike her two half brothers, one of whom later died from his injuries, in the groin.

headline.print_headline: Murder Trial Begins for Woman Charged in Fatal Beating of Half Brother at Church
headline.main: Trial Begins for Woman Charged in Fatal Beating of Half Brother at Church

snippet: Sarah Ferguson is accused of using a power cord to repeatedly strike her two half brothers, one of whom later died from his injuries, in the groin.
abstract: Murder trial begins in Oneida County for Sarah Ferguson, member of Word of Life Christian Church charged in death of her half-brother Lucas Leonard during 14-hour group attack during church counseling session; Lucas bled to death after repeated blows by his sister, who was one of nine relatives and church members charged in fatal beating that also left Lucas's younger brother Christopher hospitalized.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Word of Life Christian Church (New Hartford, NY)
